description: 12-room dollhouse--wired for electricity in each room and plumbed for running water in bathroom; furnishings and dolls for each room included; two additional boxes of dollhouse furniture and dolls included; matching stepstool; see Notes for inventory; see object file for photographs of each room in situ at donor's residence; furnished dollhouse installed in G110--box of extra materials on R2A1.1 MS.
title: 12-room dollhouse with dolls and furniture
